content:
It's completely understandable to reminisce about the ceremony! It's a special moment to cherish, and I'm sure you're excited to celebrate with your niece and the rest of the family.

Good luck with your search for a restaurant! I hope you find a great spot that everyone will enjoy. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more help or have any other questions.

Remember to relax, have fun, and make some wonderful memories with your family. Congratulations again to your niece on her graduation!
